title: Top Places to visit in Pithoragarh, Uttarakhand
content: Pithoragarh is the easternmost district in the state of Uttarakhand, India. It is located in the Himalayas and has an area of 7,110 km2 (2,750 sq mi) and a population of 483,439 (as of 2011). The town of Pithoragarh, located in Saur Valley, is its headquarters.
